ygData.subject: Re: Explanations
ygData.msgSnippet: Teltoli was shocked. Was this really the Carnage she had first met when she had come to this planet for her first time? A dagger of fear twisted itself in her

Teltoli was shocked. Was this really the Carnage she had first met 
when she had come to this planet for her first time?

A dagger of fear twisted itself in her gut. Carnage didn't want her 
as a friend? Well. She was going to say something to that!

The Fuzor began to follow her again, from a few meters distance, but 
just enough to let Carnage know that she was still keeping up.

"You think I'm not Loyal? That I can be Trusted?" She seethed. "What 
about in the time that we were here on Earth, the first time? Does 
that mean NOTHING to you? If I wasn't a friend, don't you think I 
would have joined the Maximals by now, instead of risking my life to 
come here! I sought you out, tried to apologize, note the word TRIED, 
and you shove me off like I'm some dirt underneath your foot? That 
I'm not even worth considering?"

She took a couple of deep breaths, eyes wide with her anger. "If you 
would learn to trust the right people, then you wouldn't be run all 
over! If I had of known you would be like this when I went away, then 
I never would have left! Back then, Carnage, you seemed like nothing 
could ever knock you down.."

Teltoli's voice had quietened, and her ears drooped with sadness. 
"You always seemed stronger than anyone I ever knew, even my Father. 
I looked up to you, and anyone that strong would have been able to 
cope" She whispered, just loud enough.

"I'm sorry that you think you get run over, but that doesn't mean 
that I tried to trample all over you. I never did, and I never will"

Her anger had fizzeled out, for the most part. She never could stay 
angry at people, for long, anyway. Her next sentance had a tinge of 
anger in it, and her ears know lay flat against her head with 
annoyance.

"But fine, if you want to trample all over me in your haste to 
destroy what could be the re-start of a great friendship, go ahead.."
